item.description: 2012 Worcester VegFest Sunday April 15th, 11am~5pm Worcester Technical HS 1 Skyline Drive, Worcester, MA 01605 The Worcester VegFest is a FREE festival to celebrate vegetarianism–an animal-friendly, environmentally sustainable, and healthy lifestyle. The event features socially responsible businesses, inspiring speakers, performers, and lots of free samples of tasty vegan food. Some really amazing speakers will be presenting at the Worcester VegFest this year. They will be posted with their bios as they are confirmed. For updates on speaker and vendors check out the Veg Worcester website. http://www.vegworcest...

group.name: The New Haven Vegan Meetup Group

item.name: Worcester Veg Fest
